//Note on PortableTV.*: These two strings are the name and description of the TV object that the player crafts and keeps in their inventory.
PortableTV.name: TV portative

//Note on remaining strings: The remaining strings are the names and explanations of options that appear on a configuration screen.
Animate.name: Animation TV
Animate.description: S'il faut animer la télévision portative lorsqu'elle s'allume et s'éteint
//Note on Static.*: 'Static' as in the visual noise that appears on old analogue TVs that aren't tuned properly. 'Light' as in 'not very much'. 'Show' as in 'to make visible'.
Static.name: Effet cathodique
Static.description: S'il faut montrer l'effet cathodique sur l'écran des programmes
Music.name: Jouer la musique
Music.description: S'il faut jouer de la musique pour les programmes de télévision standard
ActivateKey.name: Raccourci clavier
ActivateKey.description: Choisir la touche pour activer la TV portative depuis l'inventaire
